stages.instructions: Define evaluation criteria and test design from the skill spec. Record in /draft and cite evidence in /facts.
Read the skill spec and references. Produce evaluation artifacts and a test plan. No code changes. Record outputs in /facts and /revise.
Independent review of practicality and gaps. Record findings with evidence in /critique.
Address review findings, include verification against required outputs, and summarize final evaluation in /revise and /open_questions.
